item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 16 Dec 2025
item.description:
1. Software Engineer (OCaml) -- LexiFi, Paris
  2. Opam repository archival, next run (scheduled 2026-01-01)
  3. blame, a simple webapp as an unikernel
  4. A new kind of knowledge-base for OCaml's doc
  5. Serialport - new serial communication library
  6. Lwt.6.0.0~beta (direct-style, multi-domain parallelism)
  7. Call for Participation: BOB 2026 (Berlin, Mar 13)
  8. Other OCaml News
